name: Sonic In the SVG Universe
description:
Now, You Can Stop Eggman From Creating A Black Hole To Destroy the SVG Universe

How to play:

-------------------

- Move: Arrow keys

- Jump: A

- Spindash: Down arrow + A

-------------------

Each shield with different colors as it's own powerup. Take a look to see what it does when you press A again in the air (This only works on Sonic).

- Blue: Protection while in air.

- Red: Air Dash.

- Yellow: Attracts rings.

- White: Double Jump.

- Green: Drop dash (Not like Sonic Mania).
